hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: pipeline_build_id
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the githash of the release control for the current release

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
### Pull dictionary in boundary. aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 900 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/curated-datasets-s3-role --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp ${dictionary_s3_key} dictionary.javabin.tar.gz
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp dictionary.javabin.tar.gz s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${pipeline_build_id}/dictionary.javabin.tar.gz --quiet
